gobblin.runtime

Class JobContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.JobContext

extends Object
    A class carrying context information of a Gobblin job.

      • shouldCommitDataInJob

        public static boolean shouldCommitDataInJob(State state)
        Whether data should be committed by the job (as opposed to being commited by the tasks). Data should be committed by the job if either ConfigurationKeys.JOB_COMMIT_POLICY_KEY is set to "full", or ConfigurationKeys.PUBLISH_DATA_AT_JOB_LEVEL is set to true.
